subject: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND
body:
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND UNIT.
Senior Resident Representative Payment
Officer In charge Of Inheritance Payment
Mr. James Gorman.
Attention:
A power of attorney was forwarded to our office this morning by one gentleman, one he is an American national and HIS Name is Mr Gerald N. Samaroo, This man claimed to be your representative and this power of attorney stated that you are dead, he brought an account to replace your information in other to claim your fund of $1,500.000.00 (One Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars) which is now lying in a dormant account UNCLAIMED, below is the Address he have submitted:
Bank Account. City Bank
Account Name: Gerald N. Samaroo
Account Number: 6503809428.
Routing No: 122006743,
House Address: 2116 Palm Ave, Fort Myers, FL 33916
Bank Address 8400 W Broward Blvd, Plantation, FL 33324.
Be further informed that this power of attorney also stated that you suffered and died of throat cancer. You are therefore given 24hrs to confirm the truth in this information, If you are still alive, You are to contact us back immediately, Because we work 24 hrs just to ensure that we monitor all the activities going on in regards to the transfer of beneficiaries inheritance and contract payment.
You are to call this office immediately for clarifications on this matter as we shall be available 24 hrs to speak with you and give you the necessary guidelines on how to ensure that your payment is wired to you immediately and also be informed that any further delay from your side could be dangerous, as we will not be held responsible for any wrong payment.
So kindly contact us urgently if you are Alive as we have his identification and residence he provided for this payment to be wired to his account. Here is the information you are required to send via email for us to check up with the data we have in our central computer.
(1) Full Name………….
(2) Country/State/ City Name………….
(3) Home Address………
(7) Telephone Number………..
(8) A Copy of Your Passport/ Drivers Licenses: .......
As soon as you provide the information above, we will detail you with the processing on how to receive your $1,500.000.00 (One Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars).
Thank You.
Mr. James Gorman

subject: Re:   INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND
body:
Hello Mr. James Gorman,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this matter. I must say, I am quite surprised by the information you have shared. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further.

Firstly, I want to assure you that I am indeed alive and well. It seems there has been some confusion or misunderstanding regarding my status. Could you please provide more details about the person who claimed that I am deceased? How did they come to this conclusion?

Secondly, I appreciate your concern about the unclaimed funds in the dormant account. However, I would like to know more about the process of transferring these funds to me. Can you explain in more detail how this will be done? Are there any fees or charges involved?

Lastly, in order for me to verify my identity and provide the necessary information, could you please explain why a copy of my passport or driver's license is required? Is there any other way we can confirm my identity without sharing such personal documents?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with resolving this matter.

Best wishes,
Marco

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
To: Marco,

Dear Sir,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your massage. From the content of
your mail, it is obvious that you did not send anybody to represent you in
receiving your awarded funds. However we need you to help us with any
information you have about all these internet scammers. We do admonish you
to keep this exercise to yourself because more than one million people
around the globe today have been victimized in this internet scam, we have
been doing our best to see the best way of bringing it to an end.

You are entitled to receive the sum of USD$1.5Million from our office here
in States which has been awarded to you by this Organization, now you have
to help us to protect this reword scheme and give us any information you
have about this people so that our team of intelligent officers can go
after them any were in this word.

Following our procedures, I will want you to reconfirm the following to me,
as to enable me know who I am dealing with.

1. Your full name
2. Contact address
3. Direct telephone/fax
4. First two pages of your international passport/driver license.
5. Full banking data

Meanwhile, you are to send to us a scan copy of your international
passport/driver license for proper identification. Ensure that you keep
this transaction confidential; do not discuss it with anybody, because of
the confidential nature of this transaction and my work.

Lastly, immediately the Processing Fees & Stamp Duties Notarization levies
are paid within 48 hours and approved funds will be released to you. I must
encourage you to expressly do the needful as time is of a great essence in
this regard. The only prerequisite is demanded Processing Fee & Stamp Duty
Notarization Levy.

I await your utmost response.
Sincerely,
Mr. James Gorman

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
Dear Mr. James Gorman,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the internet scammers. I appreciate your efforts in trying to bring an end to this issue that has affected so many people around the world. I understand the importance of keeping this exercise confidential, and I assure you that I will not discuss it with anyone.

In regards to your request for information about these scammers, could you please provide me with more details on what specifically you are looking for? Are there any specific types of scams or individuals that you would like information on? The more specific information you can provide, the better equipped I will be to assist you.

Regarding the confirmation of my details, I am hesitant to share personal information such as my full name, contact address, and banking data without further clarification on how this information will be used and protected. Can you please explain why this information is necessary and how it will be safeguarded?

Additionally, I am unable to provide a scan copy of my passport or driver's license at this time. However, if there are alternative ways for me to assist in your efforts against internet scammers, please let me know and I'll do my best to help within my comfort zone.

Thank you once again for reaching out to me. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Marco

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
To: Marco,

Dear Sir,

Top of the day to you & your entire family. I am highly delighted to be
associated with you. Please, be informed that we are short of time in this
transaction. The process of the funds transfer must commence as quickly as
possible. It's not mandatory to send the scan copy of your passport or
driver's license. The requested information can be emailed to me. I will in
return fill out the form on your behalf. I hope it's understood. Please,
kindly email the following information.

1. Bank Name.
2. Bank Address.
3. Beneficiary Name.
4. Beneficiary Address.
5. Beneficiary Telephone & Fax Numbers.
6. Bank Account Numbers.
7. Bank Account Beneficiary Name.
8. Bank Account Swift Code Numbers.
9. Bank Account Route Numbers.

Again, if there is any information you can not supply, do forward the
available information once. It's very important we commence as quickly as
possible. Do maintain absolute confidentiality. This transaction should not
be disclosed to anybody. Have a great day.

I await your utmost response.
Sincerely,
Mr. James Gorman

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
Dear Mr. James Gorman,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well. I appreciate your eagerness to proceed with the funds transfer. However, before we proceed, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Could you please provide me with more information about the purpose of this funds transfer? Is it for a business transaction or a personal matter?

2. Can you explain why it is necessary to provide all the banking details you mentioned? What will these details be used for?

3. Is there any specific reason why you require my bank account's Swift Code and Route Numbers? How will they be utilized in the transfer process?

I apologize if these questions seem trivial, but I believe it's important to have a clear understanding of the process before proceeding further. Your prompt response would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you and have a great day!

Best wishes,
Marco

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
To: Marco,

Dear Sir,

We can confirm receipt of your email and content therein. Our role in this
endeavor is strictly to coordinate the successful deployment of funds to
your designated area without bottlenecks. To ensure all-inclusiveness, we
are obligated to intimate you with the procedure we shall undertake to
facilitate successful deployment of the funds into your designated.

As you may know already, the funds is a compensation from Inheritance
Payment of INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND UNIT. In lieu, we are inclined to
devise means to profile you as the fund beneficiary to mitigate the
bureaucracies. Note however that we adopted this procedure to ensure
compliance with the SANTANDER BANK, HEADQUARTERS BOSTON, MA and Financial
Regulations concerning outbound transfers.

We shall officially file an Application to the SANTANDER BANK, HEADQUARTERS
BOSTON, MA for clearances on your behalf using the relevant channels to do
so, after which the fund will be cleared and authorized for remittance to
your designated effective immediately. Note however that approval must be
obtained for the bulk funds thereafter, you can inform the bank on the mode
of transfer on installment. This process normally will require a meager fee
payable by you (Beneficiary) to cover Processing Fee & Stamp Duty
Notarization Levy.

On this note, your banking data are protected & secured, we demand that you
follow the instruction given and return with your any valid means of
identification.

Sir, this office would want to get your assurance that you would comply
with this directive.

Sincerely,
Mr. James Gorman

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your efforts in coordinating the deployment of funds. Could you please provide more details on how the funds will be transferred and what steps I need to take next?

Best wishes,
Marco

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
To: Marco,

Dear Sir,

I received your email and content well noted. Having said all this, all
that needs to be done is for us to make a formal Application for the
release of the fund to you as the rightful beneficiary. Of course I will
guide and guard you on how to do this and front you properly. With my
position as an Officer In charge Of Inheritance Payment, we will facilitate
a quick Approval with the SANTANDER BANK, HEADQUARTERS BOSTON, MA. We want
everything to follow due process and procedure in accordance with the
inheritance law to avoid any problem in the nearest future.

In the meantime we are putting up procedures for the official application
to the SANTANDER BANK, HEADQUARTERS BOSTON, MA this is important because we
must follow due process in actualization of this mandate. The only risk I
foresee here is your refusal to adhere to my instructions and directives.

Step1-You have to fill the information below which I will submit to the
holden bank here in the States to enable them start the processing of the
fund transfer request in your name.

1-Your full name:

2-Your address:

3-Your direct phone number:

4-Your occupation:

5-Marital statutes:

6-First two pages of your international passport/driver license.

7-Full banking data

Step2- Upon the submission of your details and your formally filing an
application of claims, the Management & Board of the bank will process your
claims, accredit your status and thus endorse and approve you as the
beneficiary. I will assist you through this verification process by
providing you relevant data.

Step3- If the bank approves your claim (I am 100% confident that they will)
they would require that your status as beneficiary be documented at the
ministries and courts. This is relevant to make your status legitimate and
ensure that the bank is empowered legally to change the account status to
your name, it is also essential to ensure that you do not encounter any
problems in your country when you receive the funds in your account.
Ordinarily, It is your responsibility to get these legal documents
processed and presented to the bank.

Step4- Once the legality of your status has been confirmed to the bank via
the presentation of the requisite legal documents and your banking details
have been sent to the bank, the bank will initiate direct bank to bank wire
transfer of the funds to any account that you provided.

Sincerely,
Mr. James Gorman

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like there are some important steps to follow in order to facilitate the release of the fund. Could you please provide more details on how the process works and what my role would be in it? I want to make sure everything is done correctly and legally.

Best wishes,
Marco

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
To: Marco,

Dear Sir,

The Legal procedure for this transaction starts by submitting an
application of claim form for immediate funds release. It's practically
impossible for us to proceed without the form being filled. We have no bad
intention as it involves your account details. If you are not safe
forwarding your account details, I suggest you establish a new account
where there will be no funds on the Account. I mean you can forward an
empty account. Again, time is very precious in this transaction. State your
position.

We await your swift response.

Sincerely,
Mr. James Gorman

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you provided about the legal procedure. Could you please clarify what specific form needs to be filled out for the funds release? I want to make sure I understand the process correctly before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Marco
